message: Let's split the money 60/40. It's a good deal for both of us in the first round.
I think we can do better. Let's split the money 60/40 in my favor.  It's a fairer deal, considering the inflation rate.
Bob, I understand the inflation puts pressure on me, but your offer was too low. This is my counter-offer. It's important to settle this before inflation eats away at the value further.
